attributes.action: recognise the armed forces I.D card as a form of id acceptable by banks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The armed forces I.D.Card is not being accepted by banks etc;as a legitimate form of identification,this is a slur on our serving personnel and should not happen,if they carry a card issued by the government that should be ample proof of their identity.
